titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Finance.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Finance.

action.text: Committee on Finance. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Hatch. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Finance for the 115th Congress.
